author: Joe Scott
description:
Get Nebula (and access to my feature documentary, Oldest & Newest) using my link for 40% off an annual subscription: https://go.nebula.tv/joescott 

After owning a Tesla Model 3 for seven years (it was the very first year of production), I decided it was time for a new car. And for reasons, I picked a Polestar 3. As someone who has reported on electric cars for years, I thought it was worth talking about my switch from Tesla to Polestar and compare the two. For anybody who might be interested. Enjoy!

title: I Switched.
